components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: Inbound Call Failures to Brazil Phone Numbers

incident_updates.body: We are observing call failures to Brazil phone numbers due to high packet loss. We are currently working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Orange Network in Burkina Faso

incident_updates.body: We are still experiencing SMS Delivery Delays to Orange Network in Burkina Faso. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Indonesia Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Three Indonesia

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Three Indonesia is conducting a planned maintenance from 17 July 2023 at 10:00 PDT until 17 July 2023 at 14:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Three Indonesia customers.
Impacted Products: Silent Network Authentication (SNA)

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth

scheduled_maintenances.name: Indonesia SMS Carrier Maintenance - H3G

incident_updates.body: The H3G network in Indonesia is conducting a planned maintenance from 17 July 2023 at 10:30 PDT until 17 July 2023 at 14:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from H3G Indonesia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - EE UK and BT UK

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partners Everything Everywhere (EE) UK and British Telecom (BT) UK are conducting a planned maintenance from 17 July 2023 at 14:15 PDT until 17 July 2023 at 21:55 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for EE UK and BT UK customers.
Impacted Products:
Verify Silent Network Auth - EE UK, BT UK
Lookup Identity Match - EE UK
Lookup SIM Swap - EE UK

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Three UK

Impacted Products: Lookup SIM Swap, Lookup Identity Match

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth

scheduled_maintenances.name: Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Multiple Countries

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partners Three UK, H3G Austria, and Wind (Tre) Italy are conducting a planned maintenance from 17 July 2023 at 21:00 PDT until 18 July 2023 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Three UK, H3G Austria and Wind (Tre) Italy customers.
Impacted Products:
Verify Silent Network Auth - Three UK, H3G Austria, Wind (Tre) Italy
Lookup SIM Swap - Three UK, H3G Austria, Wind (Tre) Italy
Lookup Identity Match - Three UK, Wind (Tre) Italy

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth

scheduled_maintenances.name: France Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in France is conducting a planned maintenance from 17 July 2023 at 22:00 PDT until 17 July 2023 at 23:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call failures to and from a subset of Twilio's France phone numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS Carrier Maintenance - Small US Carriers

incident_updates.body: A subset of small US networks in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 18 July 2023 at 2:00 PDT until 18 July 2023 at 4:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from small US Carriers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Japan Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our Voice carrier partner in Japan is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 01 August 2023 at 06:00 PDT until 11 September 2023 at 14:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects and failures to and from Twilio Japan phone numbers.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

01 August 2023 at 06:00 PDT until 01 August 2023 at 14:00 PDT
07 August 2023 at 06:00 PDT until 07 August 2023 at 14:00 PDT
08 August 2023 at 06:00 PDT until 08 August 2023 at 14:00 PDT
21 August 2023 at 06:00 PDT until 21 August 2023 at 14:00 PDT
22 August 2023 at 06:00 PDT until 22 August 2023 at 14:00 PDT
29 August 2023 at 06:00 PDT until 29 August 2023 at 14:00 PDT
11 September 2023 at 06:00 PDT until 11 September 2023 at 14:00 PDT

scheduled_maintenances.name: Czech Republic Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in the Czech Republic is conducting a planned maintenance from 02 October 2023 at 16:30 PDT until 02 October 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects for calls to a subset of Twilio Czech Republic phone numbers.
